sources.title: Hitch. Hike. 1977. Italian. 1080p. Blu Ray. H 264. Aac Vxt
sources.description: AKA HITCH HIKE ORIGINAL ITALIAN AUDIO NO SUBS AS OF NOW WARNING: DISTURBING CONTENT, DISTURBING THEMES, DEPICTIONS OF SEXUAL VIOLENCE, SEXUAL ABUSE, VIOLENT CONTENT AND NUDITY! VIEWER DISCRETION IS ADVISED!  PLOT:  A bickering couple driving cross-country pick up a murderous hitchhiker who threatens to kill them unless they take him to a sanctuary. In return he agrees to split some bank loot he has on him
